to be countenanced. Most shameless are Donald Rumsfeld 's attempts to deny the undeniable fact that he ordered far fewer troops to Iraq than his army's generals recommended. Tommy] Franks and me, there was no conflict whatsoever regarding force levels. If anyone suggested to Franks or Myers that the war plan lacked sufficient troops, they never informed me ( p. 452). This is playing word games. The key phrase is that there was no disagreement "among those of us responsible for the planning"- by which he apparently means statutorily

Charlotte. The 49ers neutralized Tu Holloway , a player of the year candidate, and handed the Musketeers their first A-10 loss, 66-62. Tu Holloway missed all eight of his three-point tries and went 3 of 17 overall. It's like in football if you're playing Michael Vick , 49ers coach Alan Major told the Charlotte Observer. "You'd rather Michael Vick throw it than run. We'd rather have[ Tu Holloway ] shooting over you rather than driving around you." 9. Poor man

Video: Howard Stern signs autographs before David Letterman appearance Howard Stern first joked about David Letterman 's 2009 tabloid troubles by referencing his own experiences working at CBS. "You had your scandal. Charlie Sheen has his scandal. They keep hiring you guys. Me, I got fired. They took me to court and sued me. What did I do wrong? I mentioned where I work... You guys are up to shenanigans I'm back stage looking over everyone going: "Did you have sex with David Letterman ?".
